Package com.telenav.kivakit.ui.desktop.graphics.drawing

Interface DrawingSurface

    Coordinated, CoordinateSystem, com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.interfaces.naming.Named

    public interface DrawingSurface
extends CoordinateSystem

      • drawText

        void drawText​(Style style,
              DrawingPoint at,
              java.lang.String text)
        Draws the given text, in the given style, at the given DrawingPoint. Because determining text shape is expensive, this method has no return value. To get the shape of drawn text, call textShape(Style, DrawingPoint, String)

      • drawingArea

        default DrawingRectangle drawingArea()

      • textShape

        java.awt.Shape textShape​(Style style,
                         DrawingPoint at,
                         java.lang.String text)
        Returns:
        The shape of the given text drawn im the given style at the given location

      • textSize

        DrawingSize textSize​(Style style,
                     java.lang.String text)
        Returns:
        The size of the given text in the given style when rendered on this surface
